text: 'Bonnavoulin or Bunavullin (') is a village on the Morvern peninsula in the Highlands of Scotland. Situated at the northern terminus of the B849, it is about from Lochaline and on the eastern shore of the Sound of Mull opposite the isle of Mull and is in the Highland Council area. ==References== Category:Populated places in Lochaber Category:Morvern
title: Bonnavoulin
